## Introduction {data-background=#EAF8F7}
<font size="5"><span style="color:black">**Problem**</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">People nowadays face a hectic life until they ignore their daily diets. This causes obesity becomes the most common disease occurs among Malaysians.</span></font>  
</br>
<font size="5"><span style="color:black">**Questions**</span></font>   
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">- How to find out your recommended calories requirement for the day?  
- How to find out the amount of calories and nutrients in the foods you eat?
</span></font>  
</br>
<font size="5"><span style="color:black">**Stakeholders**</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">- Ministry of Health  
- Nutritionist  
- Public who emphasize their diets</span></font>  
</br>
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">*ShinyApp:* https://wanying.shinyapps.io/HealthyPlanet/</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">*GitHub: *https://github.com/wanyinggg/NutritionCalculator</span></font>  

## Data {data-background=#EAF8F7}
<font size="5"><span style="color:black">**Description of dataset**</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">
We found and retrieve the dataset from kaggle. The dataset contains 8790 rows and 77 columns, showing the nutrition values such as calories, fat, and vitamin for each type of food. These data are the fundamentals of food-based dietary guidelines for healthy nutrition.  
*Link of dataset:* https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trolukovich/nutritional-values-for-common-foods-and-products</span></font>  

</br>  

<div class="columns-2">
<font size="5"><span style="color:black">**Data Cleaning**</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">
We cleaned the data by removing the unit of each value to make the attributes numeric and deleting some unused columns. The cleaned dataset contained 8790 rows with 24 columns.    

</span></font>  

<font size="5"><span style="color:black">**Data Analysis**</span></font>  
<font size="3"><span style="color:midnightblue">
The amount of nutrients contained in food will be displayed to estimate the nutrient intake from food consumption because adequate nutrition is one of the pillars of public health.
</span></font>
</div>
